DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether intramuscular naloxone 0.4mg. is effective in prophylaxis of intrathecal morphine induced pruritus after cesarean section.
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy of Intramuscular Naloxone 0.4mg. in Prophylaxis of Intrathecal Morphine Induced Pruritus After Cesarean Section
DOC.criteria: patient schedule for cesarean section ASA class 1 have contraindication for spinal block complicated pregnancy have history of drug abuse during pregnancy obesity BMI>35kg./m2
